description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax. Item 1, GSIN: 4820, NSN: 21-908-1077, VALVE, SAFETY RELIEF \\[...\] The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Safety Relief Valves**

**Contract Title:** *Providing Safety Relief Valves*

**Solicitation Number:** W8482-241822/A

**Publication Date:** 2023-07-14

**Closing Date:** 2023-08-23T14:00:00

The Government of Canada has issued a Request for Proposal for the procurement of Safety Relief Valves. The following items are required:

* Valve, Safety Relief, Part No.: 770436-006
	+ NSN: 21-9081077
	+ Quantity: 10
	+ Unit of Issue: EA
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt
* Valve, Safety Relief, Part No.: 770436-006
	+ NSN: 21-9081077
	+ Quantity: 10
	+ Unit of Issue: EA
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Halifax

The procurement is subject to the following selection criteria:

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

The Government of Canada retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Bidders are required to submit prices in Canadian dollars. Foreign currencies will not be accepted.

Documents related to this procurement may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Trade Agreements**

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact:

Jean-Pierre Normandin
Email: [jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (819) 939-3674
Address: 101 Colonel by Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada

**Document Attachments**

* Tender Notice (English): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7221/rfp-w8482-241822-a-en.pdf>
* Tender Notice (French): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7221/rfp-w8482-241822-a
